amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase by $245,000,000 the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability and Efficiency account and decrease the Weapons Activities account by $245,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to increase by $245,000,000 the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability and Efficiency account and decrease the Weapons Activities account by $245,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 264 (Roll no. 313).
